statements: SELECT * FROM hotel_staff_roles;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE access_level = 1;
SELECT role, staff_name FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE staff_id = 101;
SELECT staff_name, role FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE access_level >= 2 ORDER BY staff_name ASC;
SELECT staff_name, access_level FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE role LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT * FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE staff_id = 1 ORDER BY staff_name DESC;
SELECT staff_name, role, access_level FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT staff_name, role FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY staff_name ASC, access_level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE staff_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY role;
SELECT staff_id, role, access_level FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE role LIKE '%Supervisor%' AND access_level >= 2 ORDER BY staff_id ASC, access_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotel_staff_roles;
SELECT staff_id, role_name FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT role_name, staff_id, access_level FROM hotel_staff_roles ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT staff_id, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM staff_access_logs GROUP BY staff_id;
SELECT * FROM staff_access_logs WHERE accessed_data LIKE '%customer%';
SELECT staff_id, role_name FROM hotel_staff_roles
SELECT role_name, access_level FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE access_level > 2
SELECT * FROM hotel_staff_roles WHERE role_name = 'Manager'
SELECT staff_id, access_time, accessed_data FROM staff_access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC
SELECT log_id, staff_id, access_time, accessed_data FROM staff_access_logs WHERE staff_id = 101
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT staff_name, role_name FROM staff JOIN roles ON staff.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT staff_name, role_name FROM staff JOIN roles ON staff.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT access_level_name FROM access_levels ORDER BY access_level_id ASC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT staff_name, role_name FROM staff JOIN roles ON staff.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT staff.staff_id, staff.staff_name, roles.role_name FROM staff LEFT JOIN roles ON staff.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT roles.role_name, COUNT(*) AS role_count FROM roles JOIN staff ON roles.role_id = staff.role_id GROUP BY roles.role_name;
SELECT staff.staff_name, access_levels.access_level_name FROM staff CROSS JOIN access_levels WHERE staff.staff_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT employee_name, shift_date FROM employees JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE assignment_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT employee_name, role_name FROM employees JOIN roles ON employees.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT role_id, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY role_id;
SELECT employee_name, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM employees JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM roles
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY access_level DESC
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, role_id FROM staff WHERE staff_id = 1001
SELECT access_time FROM access_logs WHERE staff_id = 2002 ORDER BY access_time DESC
SELECT dept_name, staff_name FROM departments JOIN staff ON departments.manager_id = staff.staff_id
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT staff_name, access_time FROM staff JOIN access_logs ON staff.staff_id = access_logs.staff_id WHERE access_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT dept_id, dept_name, staff_name FROM departments JOIN staff ON departments.manager_id = staff.staff_id WHERE dept_name LIKE 'Eng%' ORDER BY staff_name;

SELECT room_id, staff_name, access_time FROM room_access JOIN staff ON room_access.staff_id = staff.staff_id WHERE access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY access_time DESC, staff_name ASC;

SELECT staff.staff_id, roles.role_name, departments.dept_name FROM staff JOIN roles ON staff.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN departments ON staff.staff_id = departments.manager_id ORDER BY staff.staff_id DESC;
